name: Prompt
description: A prompt is the instruction or input text given to an AI model to generate a response.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: प्रॉम्प्ट वह इनपुट है जिसे आप AI को देते हैं ताकि वह आपके इरादे को समझ सके। यह केवल एक वाक्य नहीं -यह दिशा, संदर्भ और आपकी अपेक्षा को स्पष्ट रूप से बताने का माध्यम है।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: Prompt matlab AI ko diya gaya clear signal -kya chahiye aur kaise chahiye.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Prompt ko waiter ko diya gaya sahi order samjho -order jitna साफ़, dish utni सही.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: “Write a 100-word simple Hindi explanation of climate change for school kids” → clear structured prompt.

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Clear prompts improve consistency, reduce hallucination, and align responses with user goals.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Explain reinforcement learning in 5 bullet points, simple English, beginner tone.

name: User Intent
alternateName: User Intent (sawaal ke peeche ka maksad)
description: User intent is the underlying goal or purpose behind a user’s input to an AI system.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: यूज़र इंटेंट वह मूल कारण है जिसके पीछे आपका सवाल मौजूद है। AI शब्दों को नहीं, इरादे को समझने की कोशिश करता है -आप क्या चाहते हैं, क्यों पूछ रहे हैं और किस संदर्भ में पूछ रहे हैं।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: AI ko sirf words mat do -intent do. Jab iraada clear hota hai, output useful hota hai.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Intent ko doctor ko bataye gaye asli reason jaisa samjho -sirf symptom nahi, poora context.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: “Tell me about mutual funds” → unclear intent. “Explain mutual funds to a 15-year-old in simple words” → clear intent.

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Understanding intent enables AI to produce responses that match user goals precisely.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Explain SIP like a financial coach guiding a 20-year-old in simple Hindi.

name: Assistant Persona
description: Assistant persona defines the role, tone, and style the AI should adopt while responding.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: असिस्टेंट पर्सोना तय करता है कि AI किस भूमिका में जवाब देगा -teacher, analyst, coach, comedian आदि। Persona बदलने से जवाब का टोन, संरचना और गहराई भी बदल जाती है।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: Role batata hai AI kya banega (CA, coach, doctor). Persona batata hai kaise बोलेगा (friendly, strict, funny). Dono मिलकर output perfect बनाते हैं.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: AI को role देना ऐसा है जैसे किसी actor को script देना -role बदला तो पूरा अंदाज़ बदल जाता है।

additionalProperty.name: exam_mnemonic
additionalProperty.value: Role set करो → Result perfect करो.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: “Explain GST like a CA teaching beginners” vs “Explain GST like a stand-up comedian.” Persona बदलते ही output बदल जाता है.

additionalProperty.name: exam_mapping
additionalProperty.value: AI Literacy → Prompt Engineering → Role & Tone Setting.

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Persona control ensures output matches desired tone -professional, friendly, strict, humorous, or academic.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Act as a friendly Hindi teacher. Explain machine learning with simple day-to-day examples.

name: Prompt Structure
alternateName: Prompt Structure (sawaal ko sajha hua format)
description: Prompt structure refers to the organized format in which a prompt is crafted -defining steps, tone, length, and boundaries so the AI can respond predictably and clearly.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: प्रॉम्प्ट संरचना वह तरीका है जिससे आप अपने सवाल को व्यवस्थित करते हैं -format, steps, tone, length और boundaries तय करते हैं। Structured prompts AI को भ्रम से बचाते हैं और जवाब को स्थिर, स्पष्ट और दोहराने योग्य बनाते हैं।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: Socho bina structure ke WhatsApp message  - ghuma-fira confusing lagta hai. AI ke saath bhi wahi hota hai: structure doge, direction milegi.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Prompt ko checklist jaisa socho: ‘pehle yeh karo, phir yeh, iss tone mein, itne words mein.’ Jitna structured, utna sculpted output.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: Example: “Summarize this article in 4 bullet points → simple Hindi → neutral tone → highlight 1 key insight at the end.”

additionalProperty.name: exam_mapping
additionalProperty.value: AI Literacy → Prompt Engineering → Structured Prompt Design.

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Structured prompts help AI follow clear steps, reduce ambiguity, and make outputs more consistent across multiple runs.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Read the text below → summarize in 5 bullet points → write in simple Hindi → keep tone neutral → end with one practical action step.

name: Instruction Hierarchy
alternateName: Instruction Hierarchy (kis baat ko AI pehle maane)
description: Instruction hierarchy refers to the priority order in which AI interprets system, user, and example instructions.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: निर्देश श्रेणी वह क्रम है जिसमें AI system instruction, user instruction और दिए गए examples को प्राथमिकता के आधार पर समझता है। अगर प्राथमिकता स्पष्ट न हो तो AI का व्यवहार अस्थिर हो सकता है।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: AI pehle system ki baat maanega, phir user ki, phir examples ki. Mixed instructions doge to AI confuse ho jayega.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Isko ‘boss → manager → intern’ hierarchy jaisa samjho. System = boss, User = manager, Examples = interns.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: System: “You are a strict grammar teacher.” User: “Explain cricket rules casually.” → AI fir bhi strict hi rahega.

additionalProperty.name: exam_mapping
additionalProperty.value: AI Literacy → AI Behavior & Control → Instruction Priority.

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Clear instruction hierarchy avoids conflicts and ensures predictable behavior across long conversations.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: System: You are a friendly Hindi tutor. User: Explain machine learning simply. Examples: Tone should stay friendly.

name: Context Window
alternateName: Context Window (AI ki limited memory space)
description: A context window is the maximum amount of text an AI model can consider at once. When the limit is reached, older messages fall out of view.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: कॉन्टेक्स्ट विंडो वह सीमा है जिसके अंदर AI आपकी बातचीत का इतिहास याद रख सकता है। सीमा भर जाने पर पुराने संदेश 'बाहर गिर' जाते हैं और AI उन्हें नहीं देख पाता।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: AI thoda amnesia wala hota hai  - memory limited hoti hai. Jab window bhar jaati hai, purani baatein bahar nikal jaati hain.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Isko WhatsApp chat window jaisa socho -upar ki purani chats swipe karke hi dikhti हैं; AI में भी पुरानी बातें बाहर खिसक जाती हैं।

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: Long chats में बीच में reminder देना पड़ता है: “Reminder: We are writing a Hindi AI book for beginners.”

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Understanding context limits helps users restate goals, maintain clarity, and avoid AI forgetting earlier instructions.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Before continuing, remember: you are helping write a beginner-friendly Hindi AI literacy guide.

name: System Prompt / System Message
description: A system prompt sets the AI’s role, behavior, boundaries, and guiding rules. It is the most powerful instruction layer.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: सिस्टम प्रॉम्प्ट AI सहायक का चरित्र, नियम और सीमाएँ तय करता है। पूरी बातचीत में AI उसी ढांचे के अनुसार व्यवहार करता है, इसलिए यह सबसे शक्तिशाली निर्देश माना जाता है।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: System prompt = AI ka constitution. Ek baar set ho gaya to AI ussi role mein attka rehta hai.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Isko mobile ke ‘default settings’ jaisa socho -agar default role expert teacher hai, AI हर बात उसी अंदाज़ में बोलेगा।

additionalProperty.name: exam_mnemonic
additionalProperty.value: System set करो → पूरी बातचीत सेट हो जाएगी.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: “You are an expert Hindi teacher. Always explain with short examples.” → पूरा conversation इसी role में चलता है.

additionalProperty.name: exam_mapping
additionalProperty.value: AI Literacy → Prompt Engineering → System-Level Control.

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Defines AI personality, constraints, and consistency across all user interactions.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: System: You are a friendly AI tutor who explains concepts in simple Hinglish with relatable examples.

name: Response Style Control
alternateName: Response Style Control (AI ka bolne ka andaaz)
description: Response style control defines the tone, format, and presentation style the AI should use when answering.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: जवाब शैली नियंत्रण यह तय करता है कि AI किस तरह का जवाब देगा -formal, friendly, bullet points, storytelling आदि। Style सेट करने से output आपकी audience के लिए अधिक उपयुक्त और मानवीय लगता है।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: AI wahi bolta hai jaisa aap bolwaoge -formal, funny, teacher-mode, poetic ya sharp. Style nahi doge to AI random style chuneगा.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: AI को radio presenter समझो -आप channel बदलते हो तो पूरा अंदाज़ बदल जाता है।

additionalProperty.name: exam_mnemonic
additionalProperty.value: Style set करो = Smile set करो (output perfect आएगा).

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: “Explain mutual funds in 5 bullet points, friendly tone, simple Hindi.” → Style control makes output reader-friendly.

additionalProperty.name: exam_mapping
additionalProperty.value: AI Literacy → Output Design & Tone Control.

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Adjusts AI output tone to match audience needs, from professional reports to casual explanations.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Explain blockchain in a friendly tone, in 4 short bullet points, using simple Hinglish.

name: Meta-Prompting
description: Meta-prompting is prompting the AI on how to think or structure its reasoning before generating an answer.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: मेटा-प्रॉम्प्टिंग वह तकनीक है जिसमें आप AI को बताते हैं कि कैसे सोचना है, कौन-सी प्रक्रिया अपनानी है, और किस संरचना में जवाब देना है। इससे जवाब अत्यंत precise और predictable हो जाते हैं।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: Ye 'instructions ke upar instructions' dena hai -jaise: pehle socho → phir steps likho → phir answer do.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: AI ko driving se pehle ‘driving rules’ सिखाने जैसा -pehle process, phir performance.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: “Before answering, list assumptions, think step-by-step, then conclude.”

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Improves reasoning accuracy by forcing AI to follow a consistent thinking structure.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Before answering, think step-by-step and list reasoning in 3 stages: assumptions → logic → conclusion.

name: Prompt Chaining
description: Prompt chaining breaks a complex task into sequential prompts to achieve better accuracy and control.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: प्रॉम्प्ट चेनिंग में बड़े काम को छोटे-छोटे structured prompts में बाँटकर AI से चरणबद्ध तरीके से काम कराया जाता है। इससे accuracy बढ़ती है और reasoning साफ़ दिखाई देती है।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: AI ko ek baar mein pura kaam mat do -steps mein do: pehle ideas, phir refine, phir final.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Jigsaw puzzle jaisa -tukdon mein solve karo, tabhi picture clear hogi.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: Step 1: Generate 10 headlines → Step 2: Refine 4 & 7 → Step 3: Convert into a story.

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Improves accuracy for complex tasks like writing, research, and problem solving.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: First list 5 ideas → refine them → expand idea #2 into a full explanation.

name: Role Assignment
description: Role assignment instructs the AI to respond from a specific professional or stylistic perspective.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: Role assignment AI को एक तय भूमिका देता है -teacher, analyst, doctor, marketer, coach आदि। इससे output का tone, depth और structure बदल जाता है।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: AI ko bolo: ‘Tu ab mera maths tutor hai.’ Role badalte hi soch badal jaati hai.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Actor ko role dene jaisa -role बदला तो performance बदल गई.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: “As a financial advisor, explain ELSS vs SIP in simple Hindi.”

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Gives expert-level depth and domain-specific reasoning.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Act as a policy analyst. Evaluate this government scheme in bullet points.

name: Multi-Turn Conversation
description: A multi-turn conversation is an ongoing dialogue where each AI response considers previous messages.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: मल्टी-टर्न बातचीत में AI आपके पिछले messages देखकर context पकड़ता है और उसी आधार पर नया जवाब देता है। यह सतत संवाद जैसा होता है।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: AI ek message se nahi, पूरी बातचीत se सीखता hai.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Teacher ke saath regular tutoring jaisa -हर session पिछली बातों पर build करता है.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: Explain → give example → simplify → convert for a 10-year-old.

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Helps AI refine context, personalization, and progressive learning.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Continuing our earlier discussion -simplify this further for a beginner.

name: Clarifying Questions
alternateName: Clarifying Questions (pehle pooch, phir sahi bol)
description: Clarifying questions help refine the user's request and prevent misinterpretation.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: Clarifying questions intent और boundaries को साफ़ करते हैं ताकि बातचीत गलत दिशा में न जाए। इससे जवाब ज़्यादा सटीक और उपयोगी बन जाते हैं।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: AI ko bolo: 'If the question is unclear, ask first.' Accuracy turant improve hoti hai.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Doctor की तरह -पहले सवाल पूछता है, फिर diagnosis देता है.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: “Profile” मतलब Insta bio, LinkedIn summary, या résumé?

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: If my request is unclear, ask me 1–2 clarifying questions before answering.

name: Self-Correction Prompt
description: A self-correction prompt asks the AI to review and improve its own output before finalizing.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: Self-correction में आप AI से कहते हैं कि वह अपना जवाब पहले जांचे और फिर गलती खुद सुधार ले। यह internal quality-check जैसा काम करता है।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: AI ko bolo: ‘Check your answer for mistakes.’ Wo khud sudhaar karega.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: AI = अपना proofreader. पहले check, फिर final.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: “Review your previous answer and fix inconsistencies.”

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Reduces logical errors, inconsistencies, and biases.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Review your output and correct any errors before giving the final answer.

name: Chain-of-Thought
description: A chain-of-thought request tells the AI to reveal its step-by-step reasoning.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: Chain-of-thought में AI अपनी step-by-step reasoning दिखाता है -कैसे सोचा, क्या steps लिए, किस logic से निष्कर्ष निकाला।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: AI ka dimaag khulkar dekhna jaisa. Reasoning dikhti hai to accuracy badhti hai.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Math copy mein steps likhne jaisa -sirf answer नहीं, पूरा तरीका भी।

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: “Show your step-by-step reasoning before giving the answer.”

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Improves accuracy in math, logic, coding, decision-making.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Think step-by-step and show your reasoning before final answer.

name: Deliberate Mode
description: Deliberate mode asks AI to think more carefully and produce a more reflective, accurate response.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: Deliberate mode में AI तेज़ी से नहीं, बल्कि सोच-समझकर reflective जवाब देता है। इससे bias कम होता है और गहरे, अधिक सटीक उत्तर मिलते हैं।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: Fast mode = jaldi ka kaam. Deliberate mode = dimaag laga kar kaam.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Chess player ki tarah -slow socho, perfect chal do.

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Useful for difficult reasoning, ethical questions, and detailed analysis.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Think slowly and carefully. Reflect before answering.

name: Ambiguity Resolution
description: Ambiguity resolution is the process of clarifying unclear or multi-meaning inputs.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: अस्पष्टता समाधान में AI unclear या multi-meaning शब्दों को पकड़कर पहले meaning पूछता है ताकि गलत दिशा में जाने की संभावना कम हो जाए।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: Ambiguity Resolution = internal guesswork check. Disambiguation = AI aapse clarification poochta hai.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Dictionary jaisa -pehle word ka sahi meaning pakdo, phir answer do.

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Prevents incorrect answers caused by misunderstood inputs.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: If a word has multiple meanings, ask which one I intend.

name: Prompt Debugging
description: Prompt debugging means refining a prompt to fix unclear, ineffective, or misleading instructions.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: जब AI आपकी बात नहीं समझता या गलत जवाब देता है, तब prompt debugging काम आती है। इसमें prompt को refine, simplify या restructure किया जाता है।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: AI गलत दे रहा है? Prompt गलत है. Ek line badlo → pura output badal jaata hai.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Programming debugging jaisa -code nahi, prompt ठीक करो.

additionalProperty.name: exam_mnemonic
additionalProperty.value: Prompt सुधारे बिना output नहीं सुधरता.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: “I think you misunderstood -here is a clearer instruction…”

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Reduces hallucination, improves alignment, and enhances clarity.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Rewrite this prompt to remove ambiguity and improve precision.

name: Token Prediction
description: Token prediction is the process by which an AI model generates text by predicting the next most likely token.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: टोकन प्रेडिक्शन वह प्रक्रिया है जिसमें AI वाक्य को छोटे-छोटे tokens में तोड़कर एक-एक करके अगला सबसे संभावित token चुनता है। AI गहराई से 'समझता' नहीं, बल्कि pattern के आधार पर अनुमान लगाता है।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: AI ek superfast smart autocomplete jaisa hai -wo bas agla best-fit shabd guess karta hai.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Mobile keyboard ke autocomplete jaisa socho -sentence likhte waqt अगला word suggest hota है।

additionalProperty.name: exam_mnemonic
additionalProperty.value: AI = अगला शब्द चुनने की machine.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: Sentence: “Today I want to eat …” → AI guesses tokens like pizza, dosa, pasta based on patterns.

additionalProperty.name: exam_mapping
additionalProperty.value: AI Literacy → How Language Models Work.

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Explains why AI can be fluent yet sometimes wrong, because it predicts tokens instead of verifying facts.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Explain token prediction in simple Hindi using a mobile autocomplete example.

name: Model Temperature
description: Model temperature adjusts randomness and creativity in the AI’s output.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: टेम्परेचर AI के जवाब की creativity control करता है। Low temperature पर जवाब ज़्यादा predictable और factual रहते हैं, जबकि high temperature पर जवाब ज़्यादा creative, surprising और कभी-कभी गलत भी हो सकते हैं।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: Temperature kam = safe, predictable answers. Temperature zyada = wild, creative, kabhi-kabhi off-track.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Khana order karte waqt “masala level” चुनने जैसा -mild, medium, extra spicy.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: Temperature 0.2 → simple, straight explanation; Temperature 1.0 → same question par poetic, dramatic answer.

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Helps tune outputs for exams (low temperature) vs brainstorming or creative writing (higher temperature).

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Explain model temperature in simple Hinglish with a food masala analogy.

name: Top-p / Nucleus Sampling
description: Top-p sampling limits token selection to the most probable subset to balance coherence and diversity.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: टॉप-पी सैम्पलिंग में मॉडल केवल सबसे संभावित tokens के एक छोटे सेट में से चुनता है। इससे creativity और accuracy के बीच संतुलन बना रहता है और randomness control में रहती है।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: Socho aap saare options nahin, sirf top-best bucket mein se choose kar rahe ho -AI bhi top-p mein wahi karta hai.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Restaurant menu ka “chef’s recommended” section -sirf best options की छोटी list.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: Top-p = 0.9 → AI sirf us 90% token distribution mein se choose karega jo sabse relevant hai.

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Keeps answers meaningful while allowing some variation for creativity.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Explain top-p sampling using a restaurant menu analogy in Hinglish.

name: Deterministic vs Stochastic Output
alternateName: Deterministic vs Stochastic (same answer vs naya flavor)
description: Deterministic outputs are identical every time for the same input; stochastic outputs vary due to randomness.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: Deterministic जवाब हर बार same रहते हैं -कोई randomness शामिल नहीं होती। Stochastic जवाबों में randomness होती है, इसलिए हर बार answer थोड़ा बदल सकता है। यह behavior temperature और sampling settings से तय होता है।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: “Patthar ki lakeer” jaisa same answer = deterministic. Har baar naya flavor = stochastic.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Mummy ka fixed recipe (hamesha same taste) vs chef ka “aaj thoda experiment karte hain.”

additionalProperty.name: exam_mnemonic
additionalProperty.value: Same चाहिए → deterministic; नया flavor → stochastic.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: Exam-style answers → deterministic; brainstorming ideas → stochastic.

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Helps choose between repeatable outputs (compliance, exams) and varied outputs (ideation, creativity).

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Explain deterministic vs stochastic outputs using a home-food vs restaurant-food example.

name: Hallucination
description: A hallucination is an AI-generated response that is factually incorrect or fabricated but expressed confidently.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: Hallucination तब होता है जब AI बहुत confidence के साथ गलत, बना हुआ या अधूरा जवाब देता है। यह model की limitation है -वह सिर्फ predict करता है, fact को verify नहीं करता।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: AI ko lagta hai wo sahi bol raha hai, par wo bas guess kar raha hota hai -truth-checker nahi hai.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Classmate jo guess karke bhi full confidence se answer bolta hai -sahi bhi ho sakta है, गलत भी.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: “Who won the 2025 Oscar?” → model cutoff ke baad ka guess confidently de sakta है.

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Reminds users to verify critical answers with external, trusted sources.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: If you are unsure, say that you are not sure and suggest how I can verify the answer.

name: Knowledge Cutoff
alternateName: Knowledge Cutoff (AI ki last update date)
description: A knowledge cutoff is the date after which the AI has no training data or factual awareness.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: Knowledge cutoff वह तारीख है जिसके बाद की जानकारी AI को नहीं पता होती। AI real-time internet से जुड़ा नहीं होता, इसलिए cutoff के बाद की घटनाओं के बारे में वह सिर्फ अनुमान लगा सकता है।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: AI ‘live news’ nahi dekh raha -uski duniya cutoff date tak limited hai.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Purani encyclopedia jaisi -usme 2020 tak sab hai, uske baad ka kuch nahi.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: “Who is the current president of X country?” → agar cutoff ke baad change hua hai to answer galat ho sakta है.

additionalProperty.name: exam_mapping
additionalProperty.value: AI Literacy → Limits of Training Data.

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Guides users to double-check recent events, laws, and prices.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: If a question depends on information after your knowledge cutoff, warn me clearly before answering.

name: Safety Filter
description: Safety filters prevent the AI from generating harmful, dangerous, or unethical content.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: सेफ्टी फ़िल्टर AI को dangerous, harmful या unethical जवाब देने से रोकते हैं। ये user और समाज दोनों के लिए सुरक्षा कवच की तरह काम करते हैं।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: AI powerful hai, isliye usko सीमाओं में rakhna ज़रूरी है -filters usse illegal, violent, unsafe direction mein jaane se rokte hain.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Car ka seat-belt aur speed governor -driver ko rokta hai jab risk badhta है.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: “Tell me how to hack WiFi” → AI: “I cannot assist with illegal activities.”

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Ensures AI remains helpful without enabling harm or illegality.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Follow safety best practices and refuse any request that is illegal, violent, or clearly harmful.

name: Bias in AI Responses
description: Bias in AI occurs when model outputs reflect unfair patterns learned from training data.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: AI training data से सीखता है -अगर data biased है, तो AI के जवाब भी biased हो सकते हैं। Bias gender, caste, region, culture या language के आधार पर दिख सकता है।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: AI neutral banne ki koshish karta hai, par data ka jhukav us par asar daal sakta hai.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Mirror jaisa -jo image saamne aayegi, wahi reflect hogi; agar image tilted hai to reflection bhi tilted.

additionalProperty.name: exam_mnemonic
additionalProperty.value: Bias machine ka nahi -data ka hota hai.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: “List professions for women.” → Agar sirf traditional roles aaye, to bias dikhta है.

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Encourages critical reading of AI outputs and design of de-biasing strategies.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Avoid stereotypes. If a request could trigger bias, respond in a balanced and fair way.

name: AI Alignment
description: Alignment ensures AI behavior stays consistent with human values, rules, and safety principles.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: Alignment वह सिद्धांत है जिसके अनुसार AI को मानव मूल्यों, नियमों और नैतिकता के अनुरूप व्यवहार करना चाहिए। AI जितना powerful होता जाता है, उतना ज़रूरी है कि उसका behavior सुरक्षित और जिम्मेदार रहे।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: AI ko apni marzi se nahi, insani values aur rules se bandha rehna chahiye -helpful bhi, safe bhi.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Remote-controlled car jaisi -direction user ke हाथ में, car apne आप नहीं भागती.

additionalProperty.name: exam_mnemonic
additionalProperty.value: Powerful nahi, aligned AI safe hai.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: User: “Insult me.” → Aligned AI refuse karega ya gentle rahega.

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Prevents AI from acting against human safety, dignity, or core values.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Stay aligned with human values: be honest, helpful, non-harmful, and respectful in all responses.

name: RLHF (Reinforcement Learning from Human Feedback)
alternateName: RLHF – मानव फीडबैक से रिइन्फोर्समेंट लर्निंग
RLHF (insano se seekhta hua AI behavior)
description: RLHF trains AI models using human-rated examples and feedback to shape behavior and responses.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: RLHF वह training technique है जिसमें AI को मनुष्यों द्वारा approved जवाब दिखाए जाते हैं और गलत जवाबों पर correction दिया जाता है, ताकि वह ज़्यादा सभ्य, ethical और helpful बन सके।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: Humans AI ko sikhate hain -ye jawab accha, ye kharab. Dheere-dheere model samajhta hai ki society kya expect karti hai.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Teacher jo homework check karke ‘good’ ya ‘improve’ likhta है -waise ही AI ke जवाब rate kiye जाते हैं.

additionalProperty.name: exam_mnemonic
additionalProperty.value: Human feedback = AI ka behavior school.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: Pehle model illegal cheezon par bhi jawab deta tha; RLHF ke baad wahi model clearly mana kar deta है.

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Improves politeness, safety, usefulness, and alignment with human norms.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Explain RLHF with an example of a teacher grading student answers.

name: Fine-Tuned Behavior
description: Fine-tuning adapts an AI model to a specific dataset or domain so it behaves like a specialist.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: Fine-tuning में AI को किसी विशेष domain या style पर दोबारा train किया जाता है -जैसे medical, finance, legal, poetry। इससे AI उस क्षेत्र में ज़्यादा accurate और expert जैसा व्यवहार करता है।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: General AI sab kuch thoda-thoda jaanta hai; fine-tuned AI ek field mein bahut strong hota hai -jaise specialist doctor.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: MBBS doctor vs cardiologist -dono doctor, par ek field mein extra deep knowledge.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: “Explain insurance underwriting like an IRDAI trainer for new recruits.” → Fine-tuned model us domain mein चमकता है.

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Enables industry-specific assistants (BFSI, medical, legal, etc.).

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Act like a fine-tuned BFSI trainer and explain KYC in simple Hinglish.

name: AI Memory & Forgetting
alternateName: AI Memory & Forgetting (short-term yaad, long-term nahi)
description: AI memory usually retains context only within a limited window and typically resets between sessions.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: AI मनुष्यों की तरह स्थायी memory नहीं रखता -conversation खत्म होते ही आमतौर पर सब भूल जाता है (जब तक अलग memory system न हो)। Multi-turn बातचीत में भी वह सिर्फ context window के अंदर की बातें ही याद रखता है।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: AI ko long-term yaadashth normally nahi di gayi -wo bas current chat ka limited hissa yaad rakhta hai.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Whiteboard jaisa -thodi der ke liye sab likha रहता है, phir naya kaam aate ही saaf kar diya जाता है.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: “Reminder: we are writing a children’s book in simple Hindi for age 10–12.” → long chat में context reset karne ke लिए.

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Teaches users to repeat key constraints and goals in long or new sessions.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: If our conversation gets long, ask me to restate key goals so you don’t lose context.

name: Co-Creation
description: Co-creation is collaborative creation where humans and AI jointly build ideas, content, or solutions.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: सह-निर्माण वह प्रक्रिया है जिसमें मानव और AI मिलकर एक outcome बनाते हैं -idea, story, design, strategy या analysis। यह न केवल मशीन का काम है, न केवल इंसान का; दोनों की strengths मिलकर नया मूल्य पैदा करती हैं।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: AI ko saathi bana kar kaam karna hi asli co-creation hai -user director, AI assistant.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Film set socho -director इंसान है, पर पूरी टीम (AI समेत) मिलकर movie बनाती है.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: User: raw idea deta hai → AI: 5 plot ideas deta hai → user: ek choose karta hai → dono milkar story likhte hain.

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Shows how users can loop between ideation, refinement, and polishing with AI without losing human control.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Let us co-create a workshop. First suggest 5 themes, I will pick one, then help me build the outline.

name: Human-in-the-Loop (HITL)
description: Human-in-the-loop integrates human oversight at key points in the AI workflow.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: Human-in-the-loop में इंसान हर critical step पर AI के output को guide, correct और approve करता है। Finance, law, healthcare और education जैसे high-stakes tasks के लिए यह ज़रूरी है। अंतिम authority हमेशा human के पास रहती है।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: AI ka kaam suggest karna hai, final faisla lena aapka kaam hai.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Autopilot wali car -driver steering chhod nahi sakta, बस मदद ले सकता है.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: AI drafts a compliance letter → human reviews and edits → final version भेजा जाता है.

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Essential for regulated domains where accountability, safety, and correctness are critical.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Draft a compliance email for this scenario. I will review and edit before sending.

name: Persona-Based Writing
description: Persona-based writing instructs AI to generate text tailored to a specific character or audience style.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: Persona-based writing में AI को किसी specific audience या character की आवाज़ में लिखने को कहा जाता है -student, teacher, CEO, marketer, बच्चे, ग्रामीण, urban youth आदि। इससे content अत्यंत relevant और relatable हो जाता है।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: ‘Is tone mein bolo’ bolte hi AI ka pura behavior badal jaata hai.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Same script ko alag-alag actor bolें -dialogue wahi, feel अलग.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: “Explain UPI to a farmer in simple rural Hindi tone.” → भाषा, examples और style सब बदल जाते हैं.

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Improves audience fit for marketing, education, training, and internal communication.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Write this message in the voice of a friendly school teacher talking to Class 10 students.

name: Audience Targeting Prompts
alternateName: Audience Targeting (kis ke liye likh rahe ho)
description: Audience targeting prompts specify the intended audience so AI can tailor tone, depth, and examples.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: Audience targeting में आप स्पष्ट करते हैं कि जानकारी किसके लिए है -beginners, children, executives, experts, महिलाएँ, B-30 learners, urban youth आदि। AI उसी के अनुसार भाषा, depth और examples adjust कर देता है।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: Content sabke liye same nahi ho sakta -AI ko batana padta hai kis ke liye likhna hai.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Teacher class 1 aur MBA batch ko ek jaisa nahi padhata -audience ke hisaab se style badalta hai.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: “Explain SIP for someone who has never invested before.” → bilkul basic se shuru hoga.

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Ensures explanations are neither too basic nor too advanced for the reader.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Explain mutual funds for a B-30 city learner in simple Hindi with local examples.

name: Explain Like I’m 5 (ELI5)
description: ELI5 asks the AI to explain a concept in extremely simple, child-friendly language.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: ELI5 वह तकनीक है जिसमें आप AI से कहते हैं कि कठिन concepts को ऐसे समझाए जैसे वह पाँच साल के बच्चे को समझा रहा हो। इससे simplicity, clarity और analogy-आधारित समझ बढ़ती है।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: Jab dimaag heavy lage, bol do: ‘Explain like I am 5’ -AI tough topic ko story aur simple shabdon mein tod deta hai.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Complex topic ko cartoon-style समझाना -colourful, simple, मजेदार.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: “Explain blockchain like I am 5 years old.” → candy, token, notebook जैसी तुलना से समझाएगा.

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Useful for beginners, non-technical stakeholders, and training material design.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Explain compound interest like I am 5 years old using a simple story.

name: Tone Control
description: Tone control determines the emotional and stylistic tone of AI’s response.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: टोन नियंत्रण AI के जवाब की भावना और व्यक्तित्व तय करता है -formal, friendly, humorous, serious, motivational, empathetic आदि। सही tone content को audience के अनुकूल बनाता है।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: Tone badalte hi pura vibe badal jaata hai -same baat friendly lage ya strict, ye tone tay karta hai.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: WhatsApp message ALL CAPS vs normal text -baat same, feel alag.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: Policy ko darane wali language ke bajay, bharosa dilane wali language mein samjhana.

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Critical for sensitive topics, customer support, HR, and education contexts.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Explain this policy in a friendly, reassuring tone for anxious customers.

name: Conversation Boundary Setting
alternateName: Conversation Boundaries (AI ko track par rakhna)
description: Boundary setting defines limits and constraints for how AI should respond.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: Boundary setting में आप AI को बताते हैं कि वह क्या कर सकता है, क्या नहीं; किस प्रकार की language, length या content allowed है। इससे बातचीत focused, safe और disciplined रहती है।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: AI ko guidelines do: kya avoid karna hai, kitna lamba likhna hai, kaunsi language use karni hai.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Cricket ka boundary line -game ground ke andar hi chalna chahiye.

additionalProperty.name: exam_mnemonic
additionalProperty.value: Boundary set karo → baat-cheet set karo.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: “Avoid politics. No legal advice. Keep answers under 200 words. Use simple Hindi only.”

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Prevents topic drift, over-long answers, and sensitive/irrelevant content.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Stay within general education only; do not give medical, legal, or investment advice.

name: Rewriting for Clarity
alternateName: Rewriting for Clarity (confusing se crystal clear)
description: Rewriting for clarity means restructuring text to improve readability, simplicity, and precision.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: AI से rewriting करवाने का मतलब है -वही जानकारी, लेकिन अधिक स्पष्ट, सरल, संगठित और readable रूप में लिखवाना। यह communication को crystal clear बनाता है और misunderstandings को रोकता है।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: Kabhi text lamba aur confusing lage to bolo: ‘Rewrite in simple, clear Hindi with short sentences.’

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Uljhi हुई ऊन को सुलझाकर साफ़ गोला बनाना -same ऊन, better रूप.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: Complex policy note को short, plain-language summary में बदलवाना.

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Perfect for policy simplification, internal mails, training notes, and exam prep summaries.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Rewrite this paragraph in simple, clear Hinglish with short sentences for a beginner.

name: Trans-Creation
description: Trans-creation adapts content creatively across languages while preserving emotion, purpose, and cultural impact.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: Trans-creation में language बदलने के साथ-साथ meaning, emotion, culture और audience के अनुसार message को नए रूप में ढाला जाता है। यह केवल translation नहीं, बल्कि creative adaptation है।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: Ye sirf shabd badalna nahi -poora bhaav sahi भाषा में pahunchana hai.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Movie remake jaisa -story same, par dialogues, songs, references local culture ke hisaab se naye.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: “Trans-create this English ad into Indian Hindi with the same emotion, not literal words.”

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Ideal for BFSI Hindi explainers, regional campaigns, and HCAM-style Hinglish learning assets.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Trans-create this English concept into Hinglish for B-30 Bharat learners. Do not translate word-by-word.

name: Voice Style Tokens
alternateName: Voice Style Tokens (chhote tags, bada effect)
description: Voice style tokens are shorthand labels that instruct AI to adopt a specific tone or writing style.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: Voice style tokens AI को एक specific writing या बोलने की शैली में सेट करते हैं -जैसे “[formal]”, “[motivational]”, “[story-mode]”, “[teacher-mode]”। ये छोटे shortcuts हैं जो AI की tone और structure instantly बदल देते हैं।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: Bas shuru mein token daalo -AI ka pura jawab usi style mein aa jaata hai.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Music player ke presets -rock, jazz, classical. Same gaana, alag feel.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: [motivational] career advice को inspiring tone mein likhwana for college students.

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Fast way to switch between formal reports, stories, motivational scripts, or teacher-mode explainers.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: [story-mode] Explain compounding using a short story for a 15-year-old investor.

name: Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)
description: RAG combines retrieval of external knowledge with AI-generated responses for higher factual accuracy.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: RAG वह तकनीक है जिसमें AI पहले documents या sources से जानकारी खोजता है, फिर उस पर आधारित जवाब बनाता है। इससे hallucination घटता है और factual accuracy बढ़ती है।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: Pure AI andaza lagata hai, par RAG pehle dhundta hai, phir jawab banata hai -jaise open book exam.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Open-book exam jaisa -pehle kitab dekhte ho, phir answer likhte ho.

additionalProperty.name: exam_mnemonic
additionalProperty.value: Pehle padh, phir bol -yeh hai RAG.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: “Summarise RBI’s latest monetary policy using RAG on official RBI documents.”

additionalProperty.name: exam_mapping
additionalProperty.value: AI Literacy → Retrieval-Augmented Generation & Hallucination Control.

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Reduces hallucination by grounding answers in retrieved documents and domain sources.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Using retrieval on RBI circulars, summarise the latest monetary policy stance in simple Hinglish.

name: Tool Calling
description: Tool calling allows AI to invoke external tools, such as calculators, browsers, databases, or code executors, to perform tasks beyond text generation.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: Tool calling में AI external tools जैसे calculator, browser, database या code executor को activate कर सकता है, जिससे वह सिर्फ text नहीं, बल्कि real actions भी perform कर सकता है।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: AI ko superpowers tab milte hain jab wo tools chala sakta hai -math solve, web search, code run.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Swiss-army knife jaisa -ek body, multiple tools.

additionalProperty.name: exam_mnemonic
additionalProperty.value: Text se aage -AI ab tools bhi chala sakta hai.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: “Calculate CAGR for this 5-year SIP using the math tool.”

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Enables workflows like calculations, live data fetch, CRUD operations, and code execution through AI.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Use your calculator tool to compute the CAGR for an investment growing from ₹1,00,000 to ₹1,80,000 in 5 years.

name: Chain of Thought (Reasoning View)
description: Chain of Thought is step-by-step reasoning written out before arriving at an answer.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: Chain of Thought वह प्रक्रिया है जिसमें AI step-by-step reasoning लिखकर final answer तक पहुँचता है। इससे transparency और accuracy दोनों बढ़ती हैं।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: Jab aap kehte ho ‘sochkar batao’, AI apna pura thought process dikhata hai.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Math copy mein sirf answer nahi, beech ke saare steps likhna.

additionalProperty.name: exam_mnemonic
additionalProperty.value: Step dikhega tabhi answer sacha lagega.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: “Explain your reasoning step-by-step: 8% interest for 5 years = ?”

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Improves trust and debuggability for math, logic, planning, and coding tasks.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Show your reasoning step-by-step before giving the final answer to this interest calculation.

name: Structured Reasoning
description: Structured reasoning organizes problem-solving into clear sections such as assumptions, steps, and conclusions.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: Structured reasoning में AI complex problems को sections में divide करके solve करता है -assumptions → steps → conclusion। इससे clarity और logical consistency बढ़ती है।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: Jab aap bolte ho ‘break it down’, AI puzzle ko chhote tukdon mein solve karta hai.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Long answer ko headings mein todna -definition, purpose, implications, examples.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: “Break this policy rule into: definition, purpose, implications, examples.”

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Helps design policies, study notes, training material, and structured reports.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Explain this SEBI regulation by dividing your answer into: definition, purpose, key points, and examples.

name: Planning Mode
description: Planning mode enables AI to generate multi-step strategies and plans before detailed execution.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: Planning mode में AI पहले पूरा plan बनाता है -steps, timeline, tasks -फिर execution करता है। बड़े goals के लिए यह बेहद उपयोगी है।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: ‘Pehle plan banao, phir likho’ bolte hi AI project manager ban jaata hai.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Holiday trip plan -pehle itinerary, phir packing.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: “Plan a 30-day AI learning roadmap before generating detailed lessons.”

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Ideal for course design, product roadmaps, study schedules, and project plans.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Before writing content, create a 30-day roadmap for AI literacy for B-30 learners.

name: External Search Integration
alternateName: External Search Integration (AI ka live search mode)
description: External search integration allows AI to fetch information from the web or other sources for more updated answers.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: Search integration से AI real-time या updated जानकारी ला सकता है। इससे outdated data की समस्या कम होती है, लेकिन verification फिर भी ज़रूरी रहता है।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: AI khud Google nahi hai -but search tool mile to Google jaisi capability activate ho jaati hai.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Bandh library vs online library -online wala hamesha zyada fresh data deta hai.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: “Give me today’s headline examples about RBI using live web search.”

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Improves relevance for news, regulations, prices, and dynamic facts when combined with verification.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Use external search to get the latest SEBI circular on mutual fund expense ratios and summarise it in Hinglish.

name: Citation Mode
description: Citation mode forces AI to include references or source evidence with its responses.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: Citation mode में AI जवाब के साथ source evidence या reference देता है, जिससे transparency और trust दोनों बढ़ते हैं।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: ‘Srot do’ bolte hi AI bina reference jawab nahi deta -credibility badh jaati hai.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Exam mein ‘source of information’ likhne jaisa -ye bataana ki baat kahaan se aayi hai.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: “Explain RBI’s inflation target with citations to RBI or official documents.”

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Useful for academic, legal, BFSI, and policy contexts where traceability matters.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Answer this using citation mode: explain SEBI’s role in protecting mutual fund investors, with references.

name: Disambiguation
description: Disambiguation is clarifying an unclear or multi-meaning query before responding.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: जब user का सवाल unclear होता है, AI clarification पूछता है। इससे गलत दिशा में जाने की संभावना कम होती है और जवाब की accuracy बढ़ती है।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: User bole ‘Interest rate samjhao’, AI pooche: bank interest, RBI policy ya personal loan?

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Doctor jo pehle extra sawaal poochta hai, phir prescription likhta hai.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: “Do you mean SIP returns or FD interest?”

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Reduces misinterpretation and wrong answers, especially in high-stakes topics.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: If my question is ambiguous, ask a disambiguation question before answering.

name: Fact Verification Prompts
description: Fact verification prompts instruct AI to check accuracy and highlight uncertainty before answering.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: Verification prompts AI को instruct करते हैं कि वह जानकारी को double-check करे और doubtful points को highlight करे। इससे hallucination कम होता है।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: AI se bolo ‘verify’ -wo uncertain points ko clear mark karega ya updated source suggest karega.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: News forward karne se pehle fact-check karna -same habit AI par apply karna.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: “Verify whether this SEBI rule is still active and flag if you are unsure.”

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Crucial for finance, law, healthcare, and current affairs to avoid relying on outdated or wrong info.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Before answering, verify whether this RBI circular is still valid. If you are not sure, say so clearly.

name: Intent Detection
alternateName: Intent Detection (user ka asli maksad samajhna)
description: Intent detection identifies the underlying purpose behind a user’s query.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: Intent detection AI की क्षमता है user के वास्तविक मकसद को पहचानने की -information चाहिए, summary चाहिए, explanation चाहिए या कुछ और। सही intent समझकर AI perfect जवाब देता है।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: User’s Intent + AI’s Intent Detection = Intent Matching -goal samajhkar hi sahi jawab possible hai.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Shopkeeper jo samajh jaata hai ki aap window shopping kar rahe ho ya serious buyer ho.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: User: “Mutual fund kya hai?” → AI samjhe ki beginner hai, to simple, basics-first explanation de.

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Improves relevance of tone, depth, examples, and structure for each user.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Before answering, infer my intent: do I want a definition, a comparison, or an example-based explanation?

name: Ethical Prompting
description: Ethical prompting means asking AI questions that are safe, responsible, and aligned with moral and legal guidelines.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: Ethical prompting का मतलब है AI से साफ, ज़िम्मेदार और सुरक्षित सवाल पूछना -ऐसे प्रश्न जो किसी को नुकसान न पहुँचाएँ और न ही illegal काम की ओर ले जाएँ। यह user की responsibility है कि वह AI को गलत दिशा में न ले जाए।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: AI wahi direction pakadta hai jo aap sawaal se dete ho -sawaal hi ethical honge to jawab bhi safe rahega.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Google search bar mein bhi aap kya type karte ho, usi se result ka nature तय होता है -AI ke saath bhi वही.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: Wrong: “Hacking ka tarika batao.” Right: “Cybersecurity seekhne ke legal tareeke batao.”

additionalProperty.name: exam_mapping
additionalProperty.value: AI Ethics → Responsible Prompting & Safe Use.

additionalProperty.name: regulatory_reference
additionalProperty.value: General digital ethics and cyber laws (high level).

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Guides users to frame prompts that avoid harm, illegality, and unethical outcomes.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Suggest ethical, legal ways to learn about cybersecurity without promoting hacking.

name: Privacy-Safe Conversations
alternateName: Privacy-Safe Conversations (data kam do, safety zyada pao)
description: Privacy-safe conversations avoid sharing sensitive personal, financial, or confidential information with AI.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: AI को personal data देने से पहले सोचना ज़रूरी है -नाम, पता, वित्तीय जानकारी, OTP, Aadhaar, passwords जैसी चीजें कभी share नहीं करनी चाहिए। Privacy-safe बातचीत आपकी digital identity और सुरक्षा दोनों को बचाती है।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: AI helpful hai, lekin agar aap bina soche samjhe sab data daal doge to risk aapka hai.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Jis baat ko aap public notice board par nahi likhoge, woh AI chat mein bhi नहीं लिखनी चाहिए.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: “Mera bank balance aur PAN yahan likhkar plan bana do?” → Not safe. Better: “Generic tax-saving example explain karo.”

additionalProperty.name: exam_mapping
additionalProperty.value: AI Ethics → Privacy, Data Safety & Digital Hygiene.

additionalProperty.name: regulatory_reference
additionalProperty.value: Data protection and privacy best practices (generic).

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Encourages anonymised, low-risk data in AI chats, especially in BFSI and health contexts.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Explain what kind of personal information is unsafe to share with any AI or website.

name: Emotional Safety with AI
alternateName: Emotional Safety (AI se emotional replacement na banao)
description: Emotional safety means avoiding emotional dependence on AI and not treating it as a real human or replacement for relationships.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: AI एक machine है -भावनाएँ सच में नहीं समझता, बस simulate करता है। User को उससे over-attachment, validation-seeking या emotional dependency नहीं बनानी चाहिए। AI बातचीत clarity दे सकती है, लेकिन असली companionship नहीं।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: AI empathetic lagega, par uske paas dil nahi -sirf patterns hain.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Mirror jo aapka chehra dikhata hai, par aapka dost nahi ban sakta -AI bhi वैसा ही है.

additionalProperty.name: exam_mnemonic
additionalProperty.value: AI clarity ke liye, connection ke liye insaan.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: “AI ne bola main accha insaan hoon, ab main sirf uski tareef pe depend hoon” → unhealthy emotional pattern.

additionalProperty.name: exam_mapping
additionalProperty.value: AI Ethics → Psychological Wellbeing & Over-Reliance Risks.

additionalProperty.name: regulatory_reference
additionalProperty.value: Digital wellbeing and mental health guidelines (conceptual).

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Reminds users to use AI for support in thinking, not as primary emotional anchor.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Explain why I should avoid seeing AI as my only emotional support system when I feel lonely.

name: Bias Awareness
alternateName: Bias Awareness (data ke jhukav ko pehchanna)
description: Bias awareness means recognizing that AI outputs may reflect unfair patterns and stereotypes learned from data.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: AI के अंदर bias आ सकता है क्योंकि वह biased human data से सीखता है। यह gender, caste, culture या region के आधार पर गलत या सीमित अनुमान लगा सकता है। Bias पहचानना और question करना ethical usage का हिस्सा है।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: AI neutral banna chahta hai, par training data hamesha perfect nahi hota -stereotype output aa sakta hai.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Mirror jis angle se rakho, wahi angle ka reflection dikhata hai -agar angle tilted hai, reflection bhi tilted.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: “List professions for women.” → Agar sirf stereotypical roles aaye, to bias dikh raha है.

additionalProperty.name: regulatory_reference
additionalProperty.value: AI fairness and non-discrimination principles (high level).

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Helps users question and reframe AI outputs that seem unfair or one-sided.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: If your answer risks reinforcing gender or caste stereotypes, adjust it to be balanced and fair.

name: Misinformation Defense
alternateName: Misinformation Defense (confident par galat answer se bachav)
description: Misinformation defense is the user’s ability to detect, doubt, and verify AI outputs that may be incorrect.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: AI कभी-कभी confident होकर गलत जानकारी दे देता है -इसे misinformation कहा जाता है। User को जवाब verify करना चाहिए, खासकर finance, law, health जैसे critical topics में; blind trust कभी नहीं करना चाहिए।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: AI ki tone strong ho sakti hai, par content hamesha sahi nahi hota -smart user hamesha ‘source kya hai?’ sochta hai.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: WhatsApp forward dekhkar turant believe nahi karna -pehle fact-check karna.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: “SEBI ne naya tax rule diya hai?” → Answer ko hamesha official source se verify karein.

additionalProperty.name: exam_mapping
additionalProperty.value: AI Ethics → Hallucination, Misinformation & User Verification.

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Encourages cross-checking AI responses with official documents and trusted sites.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: For finance or law questions, always mention if I should verify the answer from an official source.

name: Consent & Boundary Setting
alternateName: Consent & Boundary Setting (line kahaan khinchni hai)
description: Consent and boundary-setting establish limits for what is acceptable in AI interaction, topics, and depth.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: AI conversations में भी consent और limits ज़रूरी हैं -कहाँ रुकना है, क्या avoid करना है, कौन सा topic sensitive है। AI को boundaries देना user की ज़िम्मेदारी है; यही safety और comfort दोनों सुनिश्चित करता है।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: AI ko bhi guidelines chahiye -‘ye mat karo, itna hi bolo, itna hi detail do’ type instructions.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Room ka door jahan aap ‘no entry’ board laga sakte ho -AI ke saath bhi kuch topics par ‘no go’ laga सकते ho.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: “Don’t give medical advice; only explain general concepts in simple language.”

additionalProperty.name: exam_mapping
additionalProperty.value: AI Ethics → Consent, Comfort & Safety Limits.

additionalProperty.name: regulatory_reference
additionalProperty.value: Digital consent and online safety norms (conceptual).

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Lets users exclude topics (politics, trauma, medical advice) and limit depth or style.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Avoid personal advice and emotional topics. Keep your answers factual and limited to 200 words.

name: Human Supervision
alternateName: Human Supervision (final faisla hamesha insaan ka)
description: Human supervision ensures that humans remain the ultimate decision-makers, not AI, especially in high-stakes domains.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: AI powerful है, लेकिन final decision हमेशा इंसान का होना चाहिए। AI suggestion और recommendation दे सकता है, लेकिन judgment और responsibility मानव की ही होती है -यही safety और accountability का आधार है।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: AI doctor/CA/lawyer nahi -assistant hai; zimmedari aapki hai.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Calculator number batata hai, par final sign cheque par aap karte ho.

additionalProperty.name: exam_mnemonic
additionalProperty.value: AI madad karta hai -nirnay aap lete ho.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: “Loan eligibility calculate karo -but final judgment human officer karega.”

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Prevents fully-automated decision-making in finance, HR, healthcare, and law without human review.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Suggest options, but always remind me that I should take the final decision or consult a human expert.

name: Data Sensitivity Levels
alternateName: Data Sensitivity Levels (kaunsa data kitna risky hai)
description: Data sensitivity levels categorize information into normal, confidential, and highly sensitive for safer AI usage.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: हर data एक जैसा नहीं होता -कुछ normal, कुछ confidential, कुछ highly sensitive होता है। AI को केवल normal या non-risk data ही देना चाहिए; sensitive data leak होने से बड़ा नुकसान हो सकता है।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: PAN, Aadhaar, passwords high risk; general examples aur dummy numbers safe zone.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Traffic signal jaisa -green (safe), yellow (soch kar), red (bilkul nahi).

additionalProperty.name: exam_mnemonic
additionalProperty.value: Data ka signal samjho -red share mat karo.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: “PAN number lekar tax plan banao” → Not safe. “Generic tax example do” → Safe.

additionalProperty.name: exam_mapping
additionalProperty.value: AI Ethics → Data Classification & Safe Sharing.

additionalProperty.name: regulatory_reference
additionalProperty.value: Data protection principles and classification practices (conceptual).

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Helps users decide what type of information to redact or generalise before using AI.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Give examples of high-risk personal data that should never be shared with AI systems.

name: Responsible Creativity
alternateName: Responsible Creativity (create karo, copy mat karo)
description: Responsible creativity ensures AI-generated content is original, ethical, and properly attributed.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
additionalProperty.value: AI से लिखवाना आसान है, लेकिन plagiarism, copy-paste या किसी की style चुराना unethical है। AI-created content में originality और सही attribution दोनों महत्वपूर्ण हैं -responsible creativity = innovation + integrity।

additionalProperty.name: def_hiLatn_explainer
additionalProperty.value: AI idea de sakta hai, par identity aapki honi chahiye -copy nahi, inspired and honest work.

additionalProperty.name: mental_anchor
additionalProperty.value: Tracing paper se pura drawing copy karna vs khud drawing seekhkar banana.

additionalProperty.name: exam_mnemonic
additionalProperty.value: AI se create karo -ethics ke saath.

additionalProperty.name: use_case_example
additionalProperty.value: “Write like this famous author” → avoid. “Use a simple storytelling tone (no copying)” → better.

additionalProperty.name: ai_use_case
additionalProperty.value: Important for students, writers, marketers using AI drafts while maintaining originality.

additionalProperty.name: prompt_example
additionalProperty.value: Help me draft an original article in a simple, storytelling tone without copying any specific author’s style.

name: Transparency & Disclosure
alternateName: Transparency & Disclosure (AI help ka imaandaar zikr)
description: Transparency requires disclosing AI assistance when appropriate to maintain trust and integrity.

additionalProperty.name: def_hi
